features: ★Royal Treatment: The disposable decorative napkins are printed with a delicate gold pattern, which shows your fashion sense. After unfolding, a side of the print is displayed in front of the eyes, which is more delicate than the ordinary one. Add sophistication to any formal occasion such as a wedding reception or anniversary party!

★Premium Softness & Highly Absorbent: Thicker and softer than standard paper towels, these linen feel paper hand towels provide greater absorbency and won't fall apart, dry your hands completely in one shot! Experience a more delicate yet durable use than your average paper towel. Our disposable bathroom towels make your life safe and healthy.

★Perfect Size Design: The whole disposable guest towel piece is 12" X 17" when unfolded, and 8.5" X 4" when folded - Has a 1/6-fold design for compact storage and extra absorbency when folded. Pack Set of 100.

★Versatile Use & Perfect Gifts: Compliment any setting with our disposable hand towels, Use for drying hands, wiping sinks, cleaning surfaces, and other general-purpose drying applications. Also, these guest hand towels are an excellent hostess gift for friends & family hosting parties, weddings & events.

★After-Sales Service: We value our customers and your shopping experience is very important to us. If for any reason our disposable napkins don't meet your standards, please feel free to contact us, and we will give you a satisfactory response within 24 hours.
body.description: Do you tired of having wet used towels piling up? About Us JOLLY CHEF specializes in disposable tableware products. Our main products include cups, plastic plates,plastic forks, knives, spoons, hand towels, jelly shot syringes, and more. Our production plants are recognized for their quality, originality, and style.Believe and choose JOLLY CHEF to make your party more eye catching and impressive. Our disposable napkins can be used for wiping hands, wiping sinks, cleaning surfaces and other general drying purposes. In addition, it makes the perfect formal place setting accent for family dinner parties! These disposable hand wipes will fulfill your needs!

Specifications： Material: paper Package size:8.6"*8.4"*4.5" Package Weight:1.9 lb Package Includes:100 * Disposable paper towel

Linen Feel Guest Towels Just say goodbye to rough and scratchy napkins and hello to these linen feel hand towels! Our disposable hand towels are made with cloth like material so they won’t tear easily even when being used. Strong Water Absorption These disposable towels have a strong water absorption capacity, can quickly help you absorb the overflow of water stains, quickly dry your hands,wipe the table, counter and so on. With a clean look and out of the box look every time, these are great entertainment at home. Wide Applicability Whether you use straight from the pack or create a napkin folding decor to complement your dinnerware,these napkins are versatile in theiruse.These guest towels are not only suitable for daily household use such as bathrooms, dining tables, kitchens, but also ideal for cocktail parties, weddings, etc. Provide a crisp.clean towel to any visitor or even customer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Absorbent, and Convenient Disposable Hand Towels for Various Occasions
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the 200 Disposable Hand Towels Soft and Absorbent Linen-Feel Paper Hand Towels, and I must say, they have proven to be a reliable and convenient addition to my home. These hand towels offer a great balance of comfort, functionality, and durability, earning them a solid 4-star rating. Here's why I am impressed with them:First and foremost, the softness of these disposable hand towels pleasantly surprised me. Despite being made of paper, they have a linen-like feel that adds a touch of luxury to the hand-drying experience. The gentle texture ensures a comfortable and gentle feel against the skin, making them suitable for everyday use and special occasions alike.In terms of absorbency, these hand towels perform admirably. They quickly and effectively absorb moisture, leaving hands dry and refreshed. I found that even with just one towel, it was sufficient to thoroughly dry my hands without feeling overly damp or needing to reach for an additional towel. The absorbent quality makes them reliable and efficient for use in bathrooms, kitchens, or any area where hand-drying is required.Durability is another standout feature of these hand towels. Despite their disposable nature, they are surprisingly sturdy and hold up well during use. I noticed that they don't easily tear or disintegrate, even when wet. This makes them reliable for daily use and ensures that they won't leave behind any messy residue or lint on hands.Additionally, the decorative design of these hand towels adds a tasteful touch to any setting. The simple yet elegant pattern complements various decor styles, making them versatile for both casual and formal occasions. Whether it's a dinner party, a wedding reception, or a family gathering, these hand towels contribute to an aesthetically pleasing atmosphere.Convenience is a key factor that sets these hand towels apart. The fact that they are disposable eliminates the need for washing and drying reusable towels, saving time and effort. The pack of 200 hand towels ensures an ample supply that lasts for an extended period, making them suitable for hosting larger gatherings or events without the worry of running out.In conclusion, the 200 Disposable Hand Towels Soft and Absorbent Linen-Feel Paper Hand Towels offer a winning combination of softness, absorbency, durability, and convenience. Their comfortable feel, effective moisture absorption, decorative design, and reliable performance make them suitable for various occasions and settings. If you're seeking a reliable and hygienic hand-drying solution, these disposable hand towels are a worthwhile choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and disposable
reviews.reviewText: These are thick and add elegance to the table. Surprisingly nice for disposable napkins. They are large and absorbent. The detail i see is expected in cloth towels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These napkins are very nice and strong. They also are very pretty and dressed up our Thanksgiving Dinner table nicely. I loved the gold color to compliment my gold trimmed dishes but I am sure other colors would be equally nice. I would certainly buy them again. They are a little prices for everyday use but if you are looking for something special these will do the trick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Soft and sturdy. They do not fall apart when wet. The towels add a touch of elegance to my bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice for powder bath
reviews.reviewText: I wish these were a little softer but they work. The design is pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice simple design. Use them in a gold wire holder, which I also got on Amazon. They are soft, but sturdy and don’t fall apart when wet.
